department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: ritual gourd; the body covered in animal skin; the stopper in the form of a human head with a ringed neck; peg-like human headed pegs attached to the sides at arm level; encrusted skin with traces of sacrificial blood
medium: gourd; wood; animal skin (monkey ?); pembe, earth, vegetable, animal and mineral elements, and cigarette stubs inside the gourd
title: Ritual Gourd
